card.1: Analyze text in search of biased or stigmatizing content
card.2: Show what terms or expressions influence the written content
card.3: Provides alternatives of biased terms or expressions
card.4: Files can be uploaded in PDF, Docx ...

description.1:

INACTIVE_MODEL.description:
The requested model is not active or available. 
Select a valid model or contact the administrator.
INACTIVE_MODEL.title: Inactive model

INVALID_API_KEY.description:
The provided API key is invalid or has expired. 
Verify that it is copied correctly and that it has valid permissions.
INVALID_API_KEY.title: Invalid API key

INVALID_CONNECTION_URL.description:
The connection URL is invalid or cannot be resolved. 
Review the configuration and protocol.
INVALID_CONNECTION_URL.title: Invalid connection URL

INVALID_IDENTIFIER.description:
The submitted identifier does not match any valid model. 
Check that this model exists in your provider.
INVALID_IDENTIFIER.title: Invalid identifier

MAX_ATTEMPTS_REACHED.description:
The maximum number of attempts allowed has been exceeded. 
Wait before trying again or check your credentials.
MAX_ATTEMPTS_REACHED.title: Maximum number of attempts reached
